body:
This PR adds smoke tests for the 1,255 Python packages in Spack. It has been tested on the 180+ Python packages I have installed on my system.

Specifically, this PR makes the following changes:

- [x] Automatically detect `import_modules`
- [x] Run import module tests as smoke tests and install tests
- [x] Update existing packages that no longer need to set `import_modules`
- [x] Remove `build_test` and `install_test` phases
- [x] Update existing packages that use `build_test` and `install_test`
- [x] Remove no longer needed test deps
- [x] Update PythonPackage build system docs

Reboot of #15370
Closes #20079
Closes #20090
title: PythonPackage: add import module smoke tests
